name: Edwards Hill Apartments, Inc. et al., Appellants, v. Gulf Refining Company
name_abbreviation: Edwards Hill Apartments, Inc. v. Gulf Refining Co.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
parties: Edwards Hill Apartments, Inc. et al., Appellants, v. Gulf Refining Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Earl F. Gloclc, with him Gloclc and Mayer, for appellants.
S. R. Di Francesco, Sr., with him George M. Spence and R. Bruce Menlce, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Edwards Hill Apartments, Inc. et al., Appellants, v. Gulf Refining Company.
Argued November 25, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Earl F. Gloclc, with him Gloclc and Mayer, for appellants.
S. R. Di Francesco, Sr., with him George M. Spence and R. Bruce Menlce, for appellees.
January 30, 1970:
